text: The Japan national under-17 football team is a national association football youth team of Japan and is controlled by the Japan Football Association. ==Honours== ===Continental=== * AFC U-17/U-16 Championship :Champions (3): 1994, 2006, 2018 * AFF U-16 Youth Championship :Champions (1): 2012 ===Unofficial=== * Tournament de Montaigu :Champions (1): 2004 :Runners-Up (1): 2005
